column4: hi, I'm about to buy a new laptop, and it'll have windows 7 preinstalled...is there a way to migrate that windows 7 install to a VM within ubuntu?
you can perform a P2V using vmware, its not an ubuntu question so is offtopic
we do it loads at work but its offftopic here
ok, thanks, i'll ask in #vmware (or #virtualbox if it exists)
